segment.source: Learn about what you need to do before you deploy your custom browser package using IEAK 11 over your network.
segment.target: Learn about what you need to do before you deploy your custom browser package using IEAK 11 over your network.

segment.source: Before you install your package over your network using IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Before you install your package over your network using IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Before you install your package over your network using IEAK 11
segment.target: Before you install your package over your network using IEAK 11

segment.source: Employees can install the custom browser package using a network server.
segment.target: Employees can install the custom browser package using a network server.

segment.source: However, you must either lower the intranet security level or make the server a trusted site.
segment.target: However, you must either lower the intranet security level or make the server a trusted site.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer 11, click Tools, Internet Options, and then the Security tab.
segment.target: In Internet Explorer 11, click Tools, Internet Options, and then the Security tab.

segment.source: Click Local intranet, and then Sites.
segment.target: Click Local intranet, and then Sites.

segment.source: Uncheck Automatically detect intranet network, uncheck Include all network paths (UNC), and then click OK.
segment.target: Uncheck Automatically detect intranet network, uncheck Include all network paths (UNC), and then click OK.

segment.source: To make your server a trusted site
segment.target: To make your server a trusted site

segment.source: From the Security tab, click Trusted sites, and then Sites.
segment.target: From the Security tab, click Trusted sites, and then Sites.

segment.source: Type the location of the server with the downloadable custom browser package, and then click Add.
segment.target: Type the location of the server with the downloadable custom browser package, and then click Add.

segment.source: Repeat this step for every server that will include the custom browser package for download.
segment.target: Repeat this step for every server that will include the custom browser package for download.
